name: Get 14!
description:
Get 14!

The aim of the game is to combine tiles with the same number in an arena of 5 x 5 tiles. Once these tiles are connected, they will merge into a single tile with a value greater by one. You are a master if you can achieve creating a tile with the value of 14!

In case you get stuck, you can use a hammer to break and remove a tile which blocks you in proceeding.
